extendedInfo.description: Lottery Companion is more than a random number generator.Lottery Companion uses a complex algorithm to choose numbers based on probability. Use credits to enable the Lottery Companion's analysis and prediction algorithm. The more credits spent on a drawing, the greater the number of drawings used in the analysis algorithm will be and the better the results will be.To utilize Lottery Companion's analysis features first, purchase credits in the credits tab. In the drawing tab choose an existing lottery game, like Mega Millions, Power Ball, Pick 3 and Pick4, from the preset tumbler or customize the tumbler setup to fit another game.Finally, specify the number of credits to spend on the analysis press DRAW and let Lottery Companion do the work for you.Lottery Companion can also select random lottery numbers without analysis. Simply press the DRAW button without spending any credits and Lottery Companion will choose a random set of lottery numbers. If you need help at any time, press the question mark button next to each section to learn more.

reviews.title: Yup gives numbers
reviews.comment: Sure looks like it us doing something when you do a drawing.  Can\'t wait to play lotto.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep it tumbling!
reviews.comment: Great app!! I like it better than an easy pick at the store.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Number Generator
reviews.comment: Great number generator with two modes.  Free mode which will randomly generate numbers.  The second mode where you can spend credits to have a number generated based on probability.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not all it cracks up to be
reviews.comment: Is only good for pick 3 and pick 4 lottos. It only has 4 tumbler variations not 5 like all big lottos or even 6. Not impressed. Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User
